message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and is worth $12000 to you, just like it is to me. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this product at a special price of $11000. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
